english.segment1: Talks about it all the time. It's a sickness he says. So sure all the time. He hates it. And I honestly believe him. So sure all the time
english.segment2: Maybe the one who screams the most. Screams about himself
english.segment3: Fed up of giving up. Clean cup please drink up
english.segment4: He sees it's eating him up. It's the price he pays. But it's not even worth a dime. So scared that people may find out. He is what he hates. So scared all the time
english.segment6: Piece by piece he's trying to build a ladder. For him to fall from. Every time he climbs. He condemns their actions. So that no one will suspect. That he's the victim for his own crime
english.segment7: This is his darkness. In which he will stand. This is his naked inside. Alone in a desert land. And I'm a coward. Shut my eyes and concentrate. On my shell, on soap and shower. Oh God how I want to tell the world. But I hesitate
english.segment8: So why don't I have the guts to tell you he's me?
